INDICATOR_NAME: Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, male (% of 24 hour day)
SOURCE_NOTE: The average time men spend on household provision of services for own consumption.  Data are expressed as a proportion of time in a day. Domestic and care work includes food preparation, dishwashing, cleaning and upkeep of a dwelling, laundry, ironing, gardening, caring for pets, shopping, installation, servicing and repair of personal and household goods, childcare, and care of the sick, elderly or disabled household members, among others.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: National statistical offices or national database and publications compiled by United Nations Statistics Division
